trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> does not exist in the collection, for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following actions occur: |MissingMappingAction|Action Taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column name.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>不存在于集合中，为给定<xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>，会执行下列操作: |MissingMappingAction |执行操作 | |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|创建<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>指定的源列名称与源列名称与<xref:System.Data.DataSet>列名称。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> </xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|Gets a null value.|
trans-unit.target: 此<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>不添加到集合。 | |`Error`|如果未提供指定的列映射，则会生成<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。 | |`Ignore`|获取一个 null 值。 |</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>
